hackathon-description-text: Hack days provide a great opportunity to Advancio employees to put on their hacker hats, to challenge themselves to build something cool and wacky, to learn something new, to do something they always wanted to do but never really got a chance to spend some meaningful time on it, and to show off their hacks to other hackers at Advancio!
hackathon-eligibility: -You must be an active Advancio employee to participate
hackathon-requirements: -All submissions must submit a 2 minute Demo video

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: A Spot in the Advancio Dream Time List

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=9572 Topanga Canyon Boulevard, Chatsworth, CA 91311, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How practical and usable is the project?
How creative is the solution to an everyday problem in Advancio?
Does it have an AHHH Factor?

hackathon-location-address: 9572 Topanga Canyon Boulevard, Chatsworth, CA 91311, USA
